attributes.action: The government should let us have equity leased at 50 and works pensions
attributes.additional_details: Because if they care about us and our money they would do this as rishi sunak says he cares about our money about time he did something good for us all
attributes.background: Let us have the money we have paid into and lower the age for equity in your mortgage at the age of 50 years old

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. Decisions about the minimum age for equity release mortgages are a matter for mortgage providers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
